official-title.#text:
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to apply
		  budget neutrality on a State-specific basis in the calculation of the Medicare
		  hospital wage index floor for non-rural areas.

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced
			 the following bill; which was referred to the

header.#text:
Applying budget neutrality on
			 a State-specific basis in the calculation of the Medicare hospital wage index
			 floor for non-rural areas

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by adding at
			 the end the following new clause:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 1886(d)(3)(E)
			 of the Social Security Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, in the case of discharges occurring on or after October 1,
				2013, for purposes of applying

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 4410(b) of the Balanced Budget Act of
				1997

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall administer such section 4410(b) and paragraph (e) of

external-xref.#tail:
of title 42, Code of Federal Regulations, as if paragraph
				(e)(4)(ii) of such section 412.64 had never applied and by using the
				methodology promulgated in the Federal Register on August 19, 2008 (73 Fed.
				Reg. 48570) (applied as if such methodology had been fully implemented for
				fiscal year 2011 using a 100 percent State-specific adjustment to the area wage
				index).

header.#text:
Application on a
				State-specific basis beginning in fiscal year 2014

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall be construed as preventing the

, for discharges
				occurring on or after October 1, 2014, from modifying the regulations under
				such section 412.64 in carrying out the budget neutrality requirements of such

header.#text:
Application of
				budget neutrality relating to floor on wage area index in non-rural
				areas

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 3141 of the
			 Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:3141

header.#text:
Conforming
			 amendment terminating application of budget neutrality on a nationwide
			 basis
